turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, from where?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: From Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, what kind of pizzas would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What do you have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you can create your own or there are special pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, sure.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i can suggest a few if you'd like.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: there is the house supreme, meat lover's, and hawaiian pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. So, I'll go with that one. I think I'll go with that one, pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to hear more specialties?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, do you want the hawaiian for all 3 pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, one Hawaiian and three supreme meat.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, so 4 small pizzas total?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: no problem, any other requests for the pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: can I get extra cheese on all the four pizzas?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, let me put that in.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: there will be an extra charge for extra cheese, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Mm, that's fine.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hmm, yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: one moment.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and will you be dining in or getting delivery?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Getting delivery.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me confirm your order for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 3 small house supremes, 1 small hawaiian, all with extra cheese for $60.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be delivered within 30 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, I'm going to pick it up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me make that correction.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be ready for pickup in 20 minutes, thanks for ordering.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: enjoy!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bye.
